entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
